title: #274 - Seth Fritz, Design Futures Manager at Brizo Kitchen & Bath Company
itunes:title: #274 - Seth Fritz, Design Futures Manager at Brizo Kitchen & Bath Company
description:
This week David and Marina are joined by Seth Fritz, Design Futures Manager at Brizo Kitchen & Bath Company, to discuss the beginnings of the brand, Brizo’s design and engineering process, traveling for inspiration, trends in design, innovative technologies in faucets, researching what users need, and much more. Enjoy!

BRIZO
Litze Line
Rook Line
Odin Line
